name: The Lookout
description: Perched high on the cliffs, this wooden tower leans into the endless wind. From here, the whole Archipelago spreads out like a map of mist and sea. Watchers take shifts spotting incoming ships, wild dragons, or storms. On clear nights, you can see the aurora dancing above the horizon.
ambient: Wind whistles through the beams, carrying the cry of gulls and the distant roar of the sea. A dragonâ€™s silhouette crosses the sun, momentarily darkening the waves below. The horizon seems endless, painted with mist and the promise of something unknown.
